questions.question: Which of the following statements about dial-up connection is correct?
questions.answer: It covers a wider area than broadband connections.
other_options: Its maximum transmission speed is 256 Kbps.
A switch is needed to set up a dial-up connection.
It is the most stable way to connect to the Internet nowadays.

questions.question: Which of the following statements about LAN is correct?
questions.answer: It can be wired or wireless network.
other_options: It limits the number of computer to 10.
It must have at least 1 server.
It can interconnect all the computers in a community.

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a communication protocol?
questions.feedback:
POP (POP3): Post Office Protocol v3 
 TCP: Transmission Control Protocol 
 IP: Internet Protocol 
 ISP: Internet Service Provider, NOT a protocol.

questions.feedback: I guess your brain does NOT exist.

questions.feedback: RAM is installed inside the computer.

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT an advantage of a USB flash drive?
questions.feedback: USB does not access data in a predetermined, ordered sequence.

questions.feedback: ROM is installed inside the computer.

questions.feedback: A tape drive is required to read magnetic tape drive

questions.question: Which of the following tasks is NOT performed by an operating system?
Which of the following is the function of disk defragmenter?
questions.answer: Reorganize the data into a better use of space.
other_options: Back up data in a hard disk.
Scan the hard disk and search for computer viruses.

questions.question: Which of the following sequences of a machine cycle is correct?
Which of the following registers contains a number of flag bits?
questions.feedback: Status Register (SR) contains information about the state of the processor.

questions.question: Which of the following register stores an address?
questions.feedback: Program Counter (PC) stores the address of the instruction will be executed next.

questions.question: Which of the following is a valid IPv6 address?
questions.feedback: An IPv6 address include 32 heximal digits.

questions.question:
Which of the following storage media is 
 most suitable for a backup of 500GB data?
questions.feedback: Magnetic tape is suitable for backup, can store up to 500GB, and most importantly, its price is affordable.
